scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.trainingdatageneration

Class TrainingDataGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • scl10.uk.ac.aber.users.trainingdatageneration.TrainingDataGenerator

  • public final class TrainingDataGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to produce training data for the warp artificial neural network.
    Author:
    Scott Lockett

    • Method Detail

      • checkFolderExistsAndCreateIfNot

        private static void checkFolderExistsAndCreateIfNot(@NonNull
                                                    java.io.File folderToWriteTo)
        Tests to see if a folder the training data is going to be written to exists or not. If it does not, the create the folder.
        Parameters:
        folderToWriteTo - The folder that needs checking to see if it exists, or created if not. cannot be null.

      • createDownsampledImageTrainingDataAndWriteToFolder

        private static void createDownsampledImageTrainingDataAndWriteToFolder(@NonNull
                                                                       java.io.File[] trainingImageFiles,
                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                       java.io.File folderToWriteTo)
        Performs downsampling of the original sized image based training data and writes the files out to the specified folder
        Parameters:
        trainingImageFiles - The files that are the training images that will be downsampled a series of times to create the new training data
        folderToWriteTo - The folder in which the training images are to be written to. If the folder does not exist, then it will be created.

      • createDownsampledWarpTrainingDataAndWriteToFolder

        private static void createDownsampledWarpTrainingDataAndWriteToFolder(@NonNull
                                                                      java.io.File[] trainingWarpFiles,
                                                                      @NonNull
                                                                      java.io.File folderToWriteTo)
        Performs downsampling of the original sized warp training data and write the files out to a specified folder
        Parameters:
        trainingWarpFiles - The files that are the training warps that will be downsampled a series of times to create the training data
        folderToWriteTo - The folder in which the training warps are to be written to. If the folder does not exist, then it will be created.

      • isUsersInputValid

        private static boolean isUsersInputValid(java.lang.String[] usersInput)
        Checks that the users input conforms to the required format and that the training file exists.
        Parameters:
        usersInput - The input passed from the user to be validated.
        Returns:
        If true, the the users input is valid. Files may not exists but that's for the reads to handle. If false then the input is not valid.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method for producing the training data.
        Parameters:
        args - 1. The path of the file that contains the paths to all of the training data paths. Can be image data or warp data 2. The folder where your downsampled files are to be written to. If the folder does not exist yet, it wil be created. 3. The number of times the data is to be downsampled between 1 - 10.
